title: NM Jamaican Jerk Chicken
ingredients: ['Marinade', '½ tablespoon Sugar', '½ tablespoon Ground allspice', '½ tablespoon Dried thyme', '½ teaspoons Cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon Ground cinnamon', '2 spring onions', '½ Onion', '1 Garlic clove', '½ tablespoon ginger', '1 Scotch bonnet pepper (or 2 large and 2 small red chillis)', '2 tablespoons Olive oil', '2 tablespoons Soy sauce', '6 tablespoons White Vinegar', '1 teaspoon Lime juice', '2 to 3 chicken breasts', '3 cups rice', '400ml can coconut milk', '400g can kidney/mixed beans']
